statements.sql: SELECT json_agg(cacheData) cacheData FROM ( SELECT cacheData FROM jsonCache WHERE tenantId = :tenantId AND userGUID = :userGUID AND tableName = :tableName AND cacheData->>'destinationGUID' = :destinationGUID ORDER BY cacheData->>'name' ) AS jc

SELECT json_agg(cacheData) cacheData FROM ( SELECT cacheData FROM jsonCache WHERE tenantId = :tenantId AND userGUID = :userGUID AND tableName = :tableName AND objectGUID = :destinationGUID ORDER BY cacheData->>'name' ) AS jc
SELECT cacheData FROM jsonCache WHERE tenantId = :tenantId AND userGUID = :userGUID AND tableName = 'destinationsList'
